name: They Came From the Sky 2 - Early Access
name_original: They Came From the Sky 2 - Early Access
description:
They Came From the Sky 2 is highly-addictive and fast paced arcade game wherein you take the role of one of the giant Alien robot with one and only one Mission: Save the Earth from mankind and make a delicious juicy Human Smoothie!

Features:
  • A excellent Family Alien friendly coffee-break game!
  • Inspired by the legendary game from Amiga: Walker and old good Defender
  • Simple controls and pure arcade action
  • Infinite replayability as you chase ever higher scores!
  • Plenty of delicious humans to abduct
  • Over 20 brutal enemy types like: Grandpa, Skateboard Kid, or disabled person on Wheelchair
  • 50 Human hidden Artifacts waiting to be discovered :O
  • Unlock New Weapons and special abilities in the Tech-Lab
  • Handcrafted pixel graphics created with love
  • Great music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Full Xbox 360 controller support
  • and of course, Elvises!

Please note They Came From the Sky 2 is currently in Early Access.
